  • 1.17.6
  • View page source

1.17.6¶

General¶

Features¶

  • Transfers: Threadpool package is obsolete, needs to be replaced by something newer in conveyor #63

Enhancements¶

  • Core & Internals: client_extract flag needs to be added to metalink list_Replicas #1353
  • RSE Manager: Replacing single ‘raise’ from rsemgr by ‘raise e’ #1366
  • Transfers: Add a activity, dest_rse policy in bulk_group_transfer #1394

Bugs¶

  • Core & Internals: list_replicas with rse_Expression and resolve_archive makes 2 files out of 1 #1352
  • Core & Internals: list_replicas with schemes=None and schemes=[…] gives conflicting results #1379
  • Transfers: Misleading error message from conveyor-transfer-submitter #1168

Clients¶

Enhancements¶

  • Clients: clients: add option to create non-deterministic RSEs #1405

Bugs¶

  • RSE Manager: Upload fails to delete left-overs #1359

WebUI¶

Enhancements¶

  • Life time model: WebUI page to list Liftetime Model exceptions #1367

Bugs¶

  • WebUI: Lifetime exception request interface doesn’t properly show errors #1295
  • WebUI: WebUI : Wrong link to DDM Dashboard #1410
